Stat Block
L13 Greater Phoenix, fly long range, HP 53, damage 16, immune to fire damage, , Shroud of Fire 5 fire damage on touch, death throws (on death all those within a short distance take 20 fire damage and ignites all flammable objects not worn or carried), rebirth (upon death after 1d6 days rises from its ashes)

Shadow Hound

Resembling monstrous, shadowy wolves, Shadowhounds are fierce and relentless hunters. With glowing red eyes and smoke-like fur, they possess heightened senses that allow them to track their quarry with uncanny accuracy. They tear through the darkness, their haunting howls echoing through the Umbra Plane.

Stat Block
L7 Shadow Hound HP 25, damage 9 L8 stealth, L8 perception, fear of fire and light

Scourge of Goblins

A group of goblins is a scourge. A Scourge consists of typically 1 goblin leader and 2d6 goblins.

W

Water Sprite

Stat Block

L10 Water Sprite HP 33, damage 11
motivation: guardian
modifications: L11 dancing, swimming, water breathing, L12 persuasion
combat: water gusher long range damage 11, drowning immediate range damage 11 (body of water needed)
loot: Find 1d6 Cyphers
